newsitem.title: USA: Omnipoint in deal with Australian operator.
newsitem.headline: Omnipoint in deal with Australian operator.

text.p: Omnipoint Corp's Omnipoint Communications Services Inc said Tuesday the Australian wireless operator Optus Communications Pty Ltd launched operational international roaming with the company.
Omnipoint said Australia is the seventeenth country to open for roaming with the company.
Omnipoint said its global system for mobile communications technology allows customers to take all their features and services with them when they travel.
